Interface EntityService<T extends PersistedEntity>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the PersitedEntity type
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface EntityService<T extends PersistedEntity>
    Interface shared by all entity services.
    Author:
    James G. Willmore
